an10.102:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata tisso vijja paripurenti.
an10.102:1.3: Satisambojjhango, dhammavicayasambojjhango, viriyasambojjhango, pitisambojjhango, passaddhisambojjhango, samadhisambojjhango, upekkhasambojjhango—
an10.102:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata tisso vijja paripurenti.
an10.102:1.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati,
an10.102:1.7: seyyathidam—ekampi jatim dvepi jatiyo tissopi jatiyo …pe… iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
an10.102:1.8: Dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena …pe… yathakammupage satte pajanati.
an10.102:1.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata ima tisso vijja paripurenti”ti.
